en.infoText: üî¶ Move your mouse to explore with the torchlight
en.aboutText: Hi! My name is Alexandre, and I'm passionate about data, innovation, and digital transformation. Driven by curiosity, I love exploring new horizons, whether through my projects or my travels. Today, I want to combine my technical skills, business vision, and creativity to contribute to projects that truly make an impact.

workExperience.title: Data management & Digital Transformation Apprenticeship
workExperience.description: Improving the maturity of digital products, building monitoring tools and steering indicators for better data management, collaborating with different teams to align data cataloging (Collibra), and leading a Data Steward community.

workExperience.title: Workflow automation
workExperience.description: Development of Ansible scripts for process automation on the ServiceNow platform.

workExperience.title: Internship at ceclant digital laboratory
workExperience.description: Web application development in Angular and Node.js (DevExtreme and Sequelize frameworks).

education.title: MSc Start Up & Digital Transformation
education.description: Master's program in digital innovation and business management, complementing a technical engineering background.

education.title: Engineering degree in Applied Mathematics - Big Data specialisation
education.description: Degree in Data Science: image processing, predictive and machine learning models, classification, and strong cross-disciplinary technical skills.

education.title: Exchange Program
education.description: International semester focused on knowledge in Data Science through various projects.

education.title: MIASHS degree at the university
education.description: Multidisciplinary degree combining mathematics, computer science, economics and accounting.

challenges.title: Mobile App
challenges.description: Develop my own mobile party game app.

challenges.title: Running
challenges.description: Complete all super-half within the next 5 years.

challenges.title: Powerlifting
challenges.description: Achieve a 600 kg total in powerlifting in the next few years.

projects.title: Workout log
projects.description: This project is for personal use, and the idea behind this application is to help me manage my workout routines. In the future, I would like to expand it into a multi-sport app to track performance.

projects.title: E-commerce web site
projects.description: In this project to develop a web application for managing an e-commerce site, the idea was to create an interactive and functional solution. Attracted by the web, I sought to develop as many skills as possible on this project: programming, content creation, design, photo editing, etc.

projects.title: Power BI dashboard
projects.description: This project is part of an initiative to develop skills in Power BI, combining Business Intelligence and Digital Transformation. It represented a concrete opportunity to apply these skills within a company that I know well and in which I have a genuine interest.

projects.title: Edge detection
projects.description: Development of an automatic detection system for road and river contours from images acquired by drone, using deep learning techniques.

projects.title: Pardessa project
projects.description: This project was led by two students who want to set up a business based around activities in Paris. My contribution? Help with framing the project by drawing up a business plan, WBS, roadmap, graphic charter, zoning, etc.
